Module: mixer

Audio mixer add-on. Implements volume faders, positional params, parametric equalizers per channel and volume fader and compressor to the master section.
Source:
  • addons/mixer.js, line 3

Methods

(static) enable_mixer_controls()

Enable mixer controls.
